Others: Shubman Gill was named Player of the Match
Hardik Pandya was named Player of the Series
The match was played at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad
The match started at 07:00 PM LOCAL
The toss was done 30 minutes before the start of the match at 06:30 PM
Hardik Pandya captained the Indian team
Mitchell Santner captained the New Zealand team
